html: While most commentators believe that this chapter refers to the history of Egypt, there seem to be many prophetic utterances of the latter days in verses 16 through 25. These will be further understood as the day of their fulfillment arrives (see 2 Ne. 25:7). Elder Bruce R. McConkie indicated that this chapter deals with local affairs and that it prophesies salvation for Egypt in the day of restoration (see Ensign, Oct. 1973, p. 82).
